title: SL is sufficiently prepared for UNHRC session - Colombage
content: Foreign Secretary, Admiral (Rtd) Professor Jayanath Colombage is confident that the Sri Lankan delegation heading for the 49th Session of the United Nations Human Rights Council is sufficiently prepared. Speaking at a media briefing, Colombage noted that the government has communicated several inaccuracies found in the Human Rights Chiefâ€™s draft report, expressing hope that they will be taken into account.
